about_the_game:
A VR game for perverts by true perverts.
You can go on a date at an amusement park with your girlfriend, who is not wearing panties.
Further, she has been set up with a remote control egg vibrator, and you can turn it on any time.
When you do so, she will probably squirm and squat down.

You can hold hands with her and walk around freely, giving you the illusion that makes you feel as if you are actually on a date with her.
Among other things, you can go on rides and go into haunted houses with her.
Fully enjoy a perverted date with your cute girlfriend by hiding and having sex with her, making her wear a bikini, or getting naked with her.


There are 13 types of rides. You can enjoy them together with your girlfriend.
Also, there is a secret tent inside the amusement park.
By all means, please go inside it, as an erotic event will take place.


You can turn 360 degrees in walking mode.
Since 6DoF is supported, you can look at your girlfriend from various angles.
You can go on rides by entering the hologram.
To get off, please touch the hologram.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content or themes that are appropriate only for adult.

Themes in this game include:

> Nakedness
> genitals
> lewd situations
> Haunted house

All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR

Recommended:
